member.name: T:VigiothCapital.QuantTrader.AlgorithmFactory.Loader
member.summary: Loader creates and manages the memory and exception space of the algorithm, ensuring if it explodes the Lean Engine is intact.

member.name: F:VigiothCapital.QuantTrader.AlgorithmFactory.Loader.appDomain
member.summary: Memory space of the user algorithm

member.name: F:VigiothCapital.QuantTrader.AlgorithmFactory.Loader.AlgorithmInterfaceType
member.summary: The algorithm's interface type that we'll be trying to load

member.name: F:VigiothCapital.QuantTrader.AlgorithmFactory.Loader.AlgorithmBaseTypeFullName
member.summary: The full type name of QCAlgorithm, this is so we don't pick him up when querying for types

member.name: M:VigiothCapital.QuantTrader.AlgorithmFactory.Loader.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new loader with a 10 second maximum load time that forces exactly one derived type to be found

member.name: M:VigiothCapital.QuantTrader.AlgorithmFactory.Loader.#ctor(VigiothCapital.QuantTrader.Language,System.TimeSpan,System.Func{System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String})
member.summary: Creates a new loader with the specified configuration
member.param: Which language are we trying to load
Used to limit how long it takes to create a new instance

Used to resolve multiple type names found in assembly to a single type name, if null, defaults to names => names.SingleOrDefault()
When we search an assembly for derived types of IAlgorithm, sometimes the assembly will contain multiple matching types. This is the case for the VigiothCapital.QuantTrader.Algorithm assembly in this solution. In order to pick the correct type, consumers must specify how to pick the type, that's what this function does, it picks the correct type from the list of types found within the assembly.

member.name: M:VigiothCapital.QuantTrader.AlgorithmFactory.Loader.TryCreateAlgorithmInstance(System.String,VigiothCapital.QuantTrader.Interfaces.IAlgorithm@,System.String@)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the specified class in the library, safely.
member.returns: Bool true on successfully loading the class.

member.summary: Create a new instance of a python algorithm

member.summary: Get a list of all the matching type names in this DLL assembly:

member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class in the library, safely.

member.name: M:VigiothCapital.QuantTrader.AlgorithmFactory.Loader.Unload
member.remarks: Not used in lean engine. Running the library in an app domain is 10x slower.
